COMMAND.NAME: copy
COMMAND.PARAMETER: bufferName The unique name of an e93 buffer.
clipboardBuffer The name of a specific buffer that is to hold a copy of the selected text.
COMMAND.SUMMARY: Copy the selected text from a buffer to a clipboard
COMMAND.DESCRIPTION: Copy the selected text from bufferName into the current clipboard, or clipboardBuffer if specified.
COMMAND.STATUS:
This command will return an error in the following cases:
bufferName is not provided.
bufferName is not an e93 buffer.
clipboardBuffer is not an e93 buffer.
